name: Unseen Fate
description:
Unseen Fate is a mystery-investigation visual novel where the memories of murder-suspects are gambled away !

Game done in 50 hours during the GMTK game jame 2022.

Thanks to CO.AG Music for the copyright free music that was used in the game.

Another thanks to Sutemo and Exuin for their amazing VN character creator. You can find it here : https://emily2.itch.io/sutemo
